Power_Thrust.help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends them flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Energy_Punch.help: Powerful focused punch that may Disorient your opponent! Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more deadly for a short while.

Bone_Smasher.help: The Bone Smasher is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Conserve_Power.help: You can channel a tremendous amount of energy through your body for a short period of time. Doing so will heal some hit points, reduce the endurance cost of your powers and boost your regeneration dramatically for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: You energize your entire body with pure power. Your powers now cost less Endurance for 60 seconds.
Your {PowerName} boosts your regeneration rate!
Your {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} points of damage!

Stun.help: Stun deals a little bit of damage, but Disorients its target a great deal. This attack can Disorient most opponents. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Power_Boost.help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner power and boost the abilities of your next few attacks.

Boost_Range.help: You can boost your powers to increase the range of your next few attacks. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You focus your inner power and increase the range of your next few attacks.

Total_Focus.help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
